channel.title: 554 error_game_js5connect
channel.description:
hello, I REALY wants to play a 554 server but i always get error_game_js5connect. this is what i did:
1. download server (carlscape 554), client (3 different clients), and the 554 cache. 2. extract the server and clients on my desktop and the 554 cache on my C: drive (C:/cache554/runescape/cache files) 3. change the load.bat in server folder to the JRE i have. 4. run the server 5. run the client (tested with all 3) 6. client get stuck at checking for updates, client bat says: "error_game_js5connect" and server bat says: [CODE] Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 connectionType 15 Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 connectionType 15 [/CODE] plz help me :(

item.title: 554 error_game_js5connect
item.dc:creator: @deviltw2nz deviltw2nz
item.description:
@deviltw2nz wrote:

Connection recieved from: 192.168.1.84 connectionType 15 Connection recieved from: 192.168.1.84 connectionType 15
Same goes to me what shall I do? Help me please i really want to start a 554 server I did the same what you did and I get the same error.

Read full topic

item.title: 554 error_game_js5connect
item.dc:creator: @karim2k karim2k
item.description:
@karim2k wrote:

badger41:

try changing the ip the client connects to to localhost (0.0.0.0)or (127.0.0.1)

how?!

Read full topic

it may be the client is not the same version as the server.

item.title: 554 error_game_js5connect
item.dc:creator: @sarranoob sarranoob
item.description:
@sarranoob wrote:

hello, I REALY wants to play a 554 server but i always get error_game_js5connect. this is what i did:

  1. download server (carlscape 554), client (3 different clients), and the 554 cache.
  2. extract the server and clients on my desktop and the 554 cache on my C: drive (C:/cache554/runescape/cache files)
  3. change the load.bat in server folder to the JRE i have.
  4. run the server
  5. run the client (tested with all 3)
  6. client get stuck at checking for updates, client bat says: “error_game_js5connect” and server bat says:
Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1
connectionType 15
Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1
connectionType 15

plz help me

Read full topic
